# Introduction

This report is designed to help explore the results of an OpenMx analysis.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(polycor)
library(purrr)
library(rlang)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(OpenMx))

opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
options(knitr.table.format = "html")

# mxtx report modules
.modules <- c(
  "model-summary.Rmd",
  "model-comparison.Rmd"
)

.modules <- system.file("modules", .modules, package = "mxtx", mustWork = TRUE)
```

```{r generate-modules, results='asis'}
src <- lapply(.models, mxtx::reportModule)
```

`r unlist(src)`
